pageContext.claim: “Well, they probably illegally impeached me in the sense that, if you look at the FBI today -- with what happened, the horrible things -- nobody cares about that now because all they're thinking about is the virus, and that's okay with me. But you look at the report that came out from IG Horowitz; it's disgraceful what went on. It's disgraceful. It's a total disgrace. They got caught in the act.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was not illegally impeached. Oddly, in this instance, he is referring back to the Russia investigation. He was not impeached for that probe, but for his efforts to force Ukraine to launch an investigation of former vice president Joe Biden.
